p: A whole plant of wild M. cordata was collected from Green Island, Taiwan, China (22°39′40.0′′N, 121°28′59.2′′E) during December 2018 and transplanted in the greenhouse at Sun Yat-sen University, Guangdong, China. After 6 months of planting, the fresh leaves of M. cordata were cut and rinsed with distilled water. The leaves were frozen in liquid nitrogen immediately and stored at −80 °C freezer until DNA extraction.
